title: Mixed Mail Messages, Drunk Parents = Yeesh 8.24.20
itunes:title: Mixed Mail Messages, Drunk Parents = Yeesh 8.24.20
description:
In episode 700, Jack and Miles are joined by White Homework's Tori Williams Douglass to discuss Republicans encouraging their parties to vote-by-mail, the Postmaster General continuing to screw over the USPS, Facebook having meetings about misinformation spreading for the upcoming election on their social media site, Drunk Parents, Project Power, movie theaters re-opening, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. North Carolina, Arizona Republican parties are encouraging their voters to cast ballots by mail
  2. Internal email tells postal workers to not reconnect or reinstall sorting machines: report
  3. Facebook Braces Itself for Trump to Cast Doubt on Election Results
  4. Movie theaters are starting to reopen. Will anyone go?
  5. AMC's reopened theaters sold out almost everywhere, CEO says
  6. Please don’t go to a movie theater: “It’s just about the last thing I’d do right now,” says expert
  7. ‘Tenet’ Review: Christopher Nolan’s Grandly Entertaining, Time-Slipping Spectacle Is a Futuristic Throwback
  8. Tenet review: Christopher Nolan's thriller is a palindromic dud
  9. ‘Tenet’ Review: Christopher Nolan’s Long-Anticipated Time Caper Is a Humorless Disappointment
  10. WATCH: Sángo - Preto e Dourado

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
